backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with authorization mixin, restaurant/menu/order data types, seeded restaurants, and in-memory maps for storing restaurants, menu items, orders, and user profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing a navigation reliability fix, associated frontend files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, light/dark mode palettes, and global base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app configuring TanStack Router routes, authentication handling, profile setup gating, and global layout.
frontend/src/cart/CartContext.tsx: Implements React context for cart state with add, update, remove, clear operations and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/cart/cartTypes.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for cart item UI data including IDs, names, pricing, and restaurant info.
Login/logout UI button integrating Internet Identity and clearing React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wrapper component blocking access to protected pages unless authenticated, showing a login prompt card otherwise.
frontend/src/components/common/AppErrorB: React error boundary that displays a styled error card with reset and reload actions.
frontend/src/components/common/ImageWith: Image component that swaps to a provided or default fallback image on load failure.
frontend/src/components/common/QueryStat: Provides loading skeletons, error alerts, and empty-state components for data-fetching views.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with header navigation, cart badge, content container, and footer.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog prompting the user to enter their name and save their profile via a mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identity and exposing login/clear actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderDetail.ts: Hooks to fetch order status and items for a given order ID using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Fetches the current user's orders, currently returning an empty list as the backend method is unimplemented.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlaceOrder.ts: Mutation hook for placing an order and invalidating related order queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useRestaurant.ts: Hooks to fetch a restaurant's details and menu using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRestaurants.ts: Fetches the list of restaurants from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables with light/dark modes and a fixed background image.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart contents, allows quantity adjustments and item removal, and triggers order placement with authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and shows order status and items with refresh and error handling, providing navigation back to the orders list.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersListPage.tsx: Lists all user orders with basic details and status, handling loading, errors, and navigation to individual order pages.
Shows restaurant info and menu, manages per-item quantity selection, and adds items to a single-restaurant cart with validation.
frontend/src/pages/RestaurantsListPage.t: Displays a grid of restaurants with images and descriptions, handling loading, errors, and navigation to detail pages.
frontend/src/utils/formatCurrency.ts: Formats numeric or bigint values into INR currency strings.
frontend/src/utils/getErrorMessage.ts: Extracts a safe, user-friendly message from unknown error values.
frontend/src/utils/imageFallbacks.ts: Defines fallback image paths and a mapping of dish names to generated images.
frontend/src/utils/restaurantId.ts: Parses and validates restaurant ID strings into positive bigints with error reporting.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and includes typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project state, known issues, and feature requests for fixing restaurant detail loading behavior.
